name: Starwalker
description: Starwalker is a space-exploration survival rpg focused on surviving a massive alien invasion on planet Earth. You'll be able to explore the solar system and beyond. You are the last human standing - ready to start a new life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Pentium i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Pentium i7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
